channel.title: Looking for beta users / feedback - Panda - Add social proof and FOMO to your website
channel.description: Panda is for any website (any CMS) and for any industry: eCommerce, SaaS, travel, blogging, lead generation etc. We did our best to make it as easy as possible for anyone to add a range of different notifications to their website — without IT know-how.
